Title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Director: Richard Fleischer, Kinji Fukasaku, Toshio Masuda, Akira Kurosawa
Writer: Larry Forrester (screenplay), Hideo Oguni (screenplay), Ryûzô Kikushima (screenplay), Gordon W. Prange (based on "Tora! Tora! Tora!"), Ladislas Farago (based on "The Broken Seal")
Actors: Martin Balsam, Sô Yamamura, Jason Robards, Joseph Cotten
Plot: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.
Production: Twentieth Century Fox, Toei Co. Ltd.
